#summary Tips for Using the Propeller Tools

While the Propeller Serial Terminal is adequate, it has its shortcomings.  One is that you cannot do a copy/paste from it to save your PhuBar parameter settings into a file.

An alternative terminal program that will allow copy/paste is "Terminal" by Bray++.  It is available here:

    https://sites.google.com/site/terminalbpp/

Just select the appropriate COM port, and then type into the transmit pane.  You can do a right-mouse->copy from the receive pane and paste into NotePad.
